properties.areaDesc: Sumter, SC; Kershaw, SC; Fairfield, SC; Aiken, SC; Richland, SC; Lee, SC; Chesterfield, SC; Calhoun, SC; Lexington, SC; Orangeburg, SC; Lancaster, SC
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 6 at 4:02PM EST until February 6 at 4:45PM EST by NWS Columbia SC
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Southeastern Fairfield County in central South Carolina...
South central Lancaster County in central South Carolina...
Western Lee County in central South Carolina...
Northwestern Calhoun County in central South Carolina...
Central Chesterfield County in central South Carolina...
Southeastern Lexington County in central South Carolina...
Northwestern Sumter County in central South Carolina...
East central Aiken County in central South Carolina...
Northwestern Orangeburg County in central South Carolina...
Kershaw County in central South Carolina...
Richland County in central South Carolina...

* Until 445 PM EST.

* At 402 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from Kershaw to near Elgin to Sandy Run, moving east at
55 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations impacted include...
Columbia, Sumter, West Columbia, Cayce, Forest Acres, Camden,
Bishopville, Springdale, St. Andrews, Dentsville, Oak Grove, South
Sumter, Shaw Air Base, McEntire Air Base, Lake Wateree Dam, South
Congaree, Pine Ridge, Gaston, Arcadia Lakes and Eastover.

This includes the following highways...
Interstate 126 between mile markers 0 and 3.
Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 63 and 119.
Interstate 26 between mile markers 106 and 132.
Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 27.
properties.instruction:
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EST for central South
Carolina. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 800 PM EST for
central South Carolina.

For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay
away from windows.
